Source.Name: DicomBrowser
Source.Summary: DicomBrowser is an application for inspecting and modifying DICOM metadata in many files at once.
Source.Description: DicomBrowser is an application for inspecting and modifying DICOM metadata in many files at once. A single imaging session can produce thousands of DICOM files; DicomBrowser allows users to view and edit a whole session—or even multiple sessions—at once.
